basic.description:
Introduction to tools and techniques for creating 2D computer animations. Introduction to animation software (e.g., Flash) and scripting languages (e.g., ActionScript). Involves a project in the student's area of interest, such as fine art, education, or commerce. 
NOTE    No computing or art background required. 
NOTE    Sufficient preparation for CISC 121/3.0. Students without programming experience should do CISC 110/3.0 (or CISC 101/3.0) before CISC 121/3.0. With permission of the instructor, students with programming experience may take this course concurrently with CISC 121/3.0.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;36Lb;48P)
basic.subject: CISC
basic.title: Elementary Computer Animation

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Exclusion   No more than 3.0 units from APSC142;CISC101; CISC110
One-Way Exclusion     May not be taken with or after: CISC121
